thread.section_title: eHealthInsurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eHealthInsurance | ehealthinsurance.com
thread.title: Dt

author: Dt
title: Dt
text: I was very specific what I needed from my insurance. I was told which policy to buy. I bought it. It covered nothing. When I called to ask about it, no one could tell me who spoke to me or sold the plan. When I called to cancel, no one could help me or tell me the status of my application. They answer the phone call right away when you need to purchase insurance and hand over your credit card information. He met his qouta for how many policies he needed and I paid and received zero coverage. Absolute waste of money. I was better off without insurance.
